name: Bean Island (Team Sowflux)
description:
We are testing out AI in Godot and have came up with some advanced AI neural networks that can evolve.

Controls:

Space - Toggle auto camera mode

Click on bean - shows brain and zooms in

Click of bean - Deselects from any AI that is selected

WASD/Arrow Keys to move camera

E/R - Toggle Raycasts

F/B - Toggle focus best AI mode
